body.p: Enclosed please find a petition, signed by one hundred persons, citizens of this county. The petition will explain itself. Should your excellency deem it proper to grant the prayer thereof, any communication addressed to Messrs Cissell & Baily my attys Madisonville Ky, will be promptly handed me.

I am dear sir respectfully
John W Poe.
